mapper.update:
UPDATE data_coach_re_club SET
data_coach_re_club.CoachId = #{ coachId },
data_coach_re_club.ClubId = #{ clubId },
data_coach_re_club.Type = #{ type },
data_coach_re_club.TypeName = #{ typeName },
data_coach_re_club.ClubHistoryId = #{ clubHistoryId },
data_coach_re_club.Avatar = #{ avatar },
data_coach_re_club.IsLastServed = #{ isLastServed },
data_coach_re_club.Year = #{ year },
data_coach_re_club.EndYear = #{ endYear },
data_coach_re_club.CreatedAt = #{ createdAt },
data_coach_re_club.UpdatedAt = #{ updatedAt }
WHERE id= #{id}
